title: Marham.pk Doctors Scraper
description: Extract doctor listings from Marham.pk, Pakistan's leading healthcare platform. Search by specialty and city to find verified doctors with their qualifications, fees, reviews, and contact information. Supports JSON API and HTML parsing.

startUrls.title: Start URLs (optional)
startUrls.description: Array of Marham.pk URLs to scrape. If provided, specialty and city will be ignored.

city.title: City
city.description: City to search in (e.g., 'lahore', 'karachi', 'islamabad', 'rawalpindi', 'faisalabad'). Leave empty for all cities.

collectDetails.title: Collect detailed information
collectDetails.description: If enabled, the scraper visits each doctor's profile page to extract additional information like services, about section, and hospital details.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of doctors
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of doctor profiles to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of listing pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for scraping. Residential proxies recommended for better reliability.
